programme.desc: seorang duda dan usahawan yang berjaya di dalam kampungnya . Dia juga dihormati oleh orang-orang kampung kerana kebaikan dan kemurahan hatinya . muncul seorang gadis bandar serta teman lelakinya yang mempunyai niat jahat untuk menggoda dan mengikis segala wang dan harta lelaki itu.

programme.title: Jatuh Bangun Juragan Singkong Membuat Suaminya Taubat Nasuha
programme.desc: Teddy sangat angkuh dan tamak, sering berlaku sewenang-wenang terhadap pekerjanya di ladang ubi kayu miliknya. Teddy tidak hanya zalim kepada pekerjanya, tetapi juga kepada isterinya. Namun, sebagai seorang isteri, dia selalu sabar menghadapi sikap Teddy. Dia selalu mengingatkan Teddy agar tidak menjadi manusia yang kejam.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep152
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep95
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep34
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep114
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep160
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Suamiku Menikahiku Demi Kembali Pada Istrinya
programme.desc: Nadya terpaksa menanggung pahitnya ketika Fahmi, suaminya yang telah menikahinya, hanya ingin kembali kepada bekas isterinya. Setelah melahirkan, Nadya diceraikan oleh Fahmi, dan Fahmi berbaikan semula dengan Adel, bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Suster El Ep36
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Bisik Sore Ep5
programme.desc: Pembawa acara menyajikan berita-berita dan perkembangan terbaru dari sejumlah kasus yang menimpa sejumlah tokoh terkenal di Indonesia.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep46
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Lupakan Abang Cilor
programme.desc: Dinda merasa sangat sukar untuk melupakan Firly kerana dia adalah lelaki pertama yang Dinda temui sebaik ini. Tanpa disedari, hubungan mereka menjadi rapat kerana Dinda sentiasa menemani Firly ketika menjual cilok.

programme.title: Lapak Cintaku Dikasih Umpan Lambung
programme.desc: Fahri dan Raisa bertemu secara tidak sengaja, dan mereka selalu bertengkar satu sama lain. Namun akhirnya, mereka saling jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Dancing Queen
programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover theyve switched bodies.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officers soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: Warriors Of The Dawn
programme.desc: To avoid invading Japanese forces, King Seonjo escapes to the Ming Empire. In his place, Prince Gwanghae leads the royal court and confronts the enemies with the help of proxy soldiers led by To-woo.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a womans three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep7778
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46664667
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep2223
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep4546
programme.desc:
The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep106
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1019
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep9
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep851852
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep681
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep457
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep5455
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each others back.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Office politics and love between co-workers complicates the lives of two computer-company employees in this romantic comedy starring Andy Lau and Sammi Cheng.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel 84, Charing Cross Road. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A police officer Tai is found seriously hurt while another officer Ling is found lying in a coma at the crime scene. Ling awakens with a memory loss and cannot explain why he was at the scene. As a result, he is accused of attempted murder. While Ling feels aggrieved, he also finds all evidences pointing to him as the murderer...

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wongs past.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actor, Danny Lee, who is both director and main actor in this film. Danny Li is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured during an illegal race. Mai Tak Lo is the student of Li. With Lis help, Mai wins a race in Macau. However, because of money and honour, Mai starts to join illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Mirror And The Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.desc: A woman claims she caught her friend red-handed cutting down all the mobiles on her front porch. A woman sells her home for three times what she paid for it and then sues a previous tenant for repairs.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep40
programme.desc: When a woman claims that she is willing to work as a paid escort to cover her overdue bills, a generous friend steps up to help her. A woman sends thousands to a man she has never met in person.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: The Untouchables is a must-see masterpiece - glorious, fierce, larger-than-life depiction of the mob warlord who ruled Prohibition-era Chicago and the law enforcer who vowed to bring him down.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep38
programme.desc: 'Preppy Kitchen: Recipes for Seasonal Dishes and Simple Pleasures' cookbook author John Kanell joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk for Drew's News: Food Edition.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep39
programme.desc: 'Alaska Daily' star Hilary Swank joins Drew to chat. Plus, 'Ghosts' stars Utkarsh Ambudkaris helping serve the news sunny-side up by joining Drew at the news desk.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Chef Pilar Valdes, interior designer Mikel Welch and Drew's News co-host Ross Mathews have you covered for your next get together!

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans S1 Ep23
programme.desc: My City - Pride suspects a mole among the ranks as NCIS and local law enforcement continue to track the Broussard Syndicate after new intelligence suggests a breach at the ports.

programme.title: The Bite S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Second Wave - Lily figures out what to do with her dangerous client; Rachel attempts to gather evidence from her various patients to present to her husband, who works at the CDC.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An ex-con drifter develops an unlikely friendship with a wealthy Dallas art dealer.

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: An aging NSA agent who's targeted for death when he tries to retire discovers his assassin is a younger cloned version of himself.

programme.title: The Bite S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Second Wave - Lily figures out what to do with her dangerous client; Rachel attempts to gather evidence from her various patients to present to her husband, who works at the CDC.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A daring yet reckless pilot who shuns teamwork and the rules of engagement eventually learns the importance of cooperation and discipline.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jrmie dreams of a life away from his familys sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his fathers despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: The Little Comrade
programme.desc: During Stalinist tyranny, 6-year-old Leelos mother is sent to a prison camp. Haunted by her mothers last words telling her to be a good kid, Leelo vows to be on her best behaviour in the hope that it will bring her mother back.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Turquoise
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous art expert was discovered in the dunes, Sievers and Ina are tasked to pursue any possible leads. However, findings of turquoise-coloured particles on the corpse point to the investigation of a long-lost painting

programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 10
programme.desc: After investigating the murder of a "designer drug" dealer, Riggs and Murtaugh find themselves in a violent turf war between a new generation of drug dealers and a Koreatown gang.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 11
programme.desc: Riggs & Murtaugh go up against one of their own when the killing of a Texas Ranger leads them to possible corruption. The case is complicated by a dark secret from Avery's past.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 09
programme.desc: Michael is back in Chicago to hash out new ideas in a hemp store, but it's not until he inspects a spooky church that people start getting stoned, literally. Plus, Michael teams up with special guest star, Jack Black!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 10
programme.desc: Michael shows some unsuspecting shoppers how to manipulate solid objects, and he reveals the truth behind how automatic vacuums work. Plus, one employee's shift at a camping store becomes very colorful - and confusing.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 11
programme.desc: At Michael's fireworks stand, he's got everything from exploding fruit to levitation sparklers. And at a Hemp store, Michael shows off his innovations in hemp technology. Plus, a time capsule completely blows one man's mind!

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 15
programme.desc: Sheldon joins Dr. Linkletter and Dr. Sturgis on a science road trip, which lands them in the middle of nowhere. Meanwhile, Georgie continues to lie about his age.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 16
programme.desc: When Meemaws gambling room is a success, she finds herself with a suitcase of illegal cash. Meanwhile, Missy starts a business and Sheldon dips his toe in the stock market.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: Offering a new take on J.M. Barrie's classic story of a flying boy who never ages, acclaimed British director Joe Wright reimagines the ageless tale for audiences worldwide. Set during World War II, the story follows the orphaned Peter, who's kidnapped by pirates and brought to the magical Neverland, where he finds both fun and dangers and ultimately discovers his destiny to free the land from the pirate Blackbeard and become the hero who will forever be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 5
programme.desc: Our buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment. Then, Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else does, but they'll have to play it cool if they want to walk away with this golden score. And later, the day's final locker smells of gas and cash, but leads to a showdown that gets one of our buyers banned from the auction.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 6
programme.desc: Minds are blown when two of our buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. Plus, Jesse takes a big gamble on some African art and sweats it out hard when the authenticity is questioned. And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 9
programme.desc: After a campaign ad targets the Shen family, Mei-Li takes matters into her own hands. Elsewhere, Delta Securitys influence over the city becomes apparent.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 09
programme.desc: The gang flashes back to 2010 as Leonard tries to remember where he kept a potentially valuable investment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 10
programme.desc: Sheldon & Amy develop a unique system to eliminate stress from wedding planning.And Raj "breaks up" with Howard after realizing he's hurting his confidence.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 11
programme.desc: Sheldon plans an authentic Little House on the Prairie dinner for Amy's birthday, while Leonard laments his own lack of accomplishments at Christmastime.

programme.title: Hall Pass
programme.desc: Rick and Fred are best friends who have each been married for many years. When the two men begin to show signs of restlessness at home, their wives granting them a "hall pass," one week of freedom to do whatever they want...

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Owen Wilson and Vince Vaughn star as two hard-partying divorce attorneys--and womanizers--who crash weddings to meet single females. But the guys' lives change abruptly when one of them unexpectedly falls in love with a bridesmaid.

programme.desc: The Paiute War - A sinister trader starts a war between the tribe and a local militia when he frames Adam for the assault of two Paiute women.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep01
programme.desc: Divided We Stand - Ted, Jamie and Reggie go macho on an all-male fishing trip-- tailed by a slighted and competitive bevy: Joan, Vicki and Harriet.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep02
programme.desc: Double Date - Jamie winds up handling two dates on the same night, blind to the fact that one of them is Harriet in disguise.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep03
programme.desc: The Gang's All Here - Jamie stumbles into the membership of a junior high gang whose vandalism tests his sense of belonging with right and wrong -- and inducts Vicki as its moll.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Four And Twenty Blackbirds - The death of an eminent painter arouses Poirot's suspicions especially when he learns that there are a number of curious events connected with the case and someone stands to inherit a fortune.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep05
programme.desc: The Third Floor Flat - A new tenant moves into the third floor in Whitehaven Mansions, but later that evening she is murdered. The neighbours discover her body and Poirot investigates.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Triangle Of Rhodes - Hercule Poirot is holidaying in Rhodes where he takes on the case of a tourist accused of murder in a case of crime passionnel. Poirot is determined to find the real murderer.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Memory - Dan Briggs and his Impossible Missions Force undertake to overthrow a tyrannical political regime in a Balkan country in "Memory"

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Operation Rogosh - The IMF learns that an enemy agent, Rogosh (Fritz weaver), has entered the U.S. intent on destroying a major city with a secret device in "Operation Rogosh"

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Coach In Love (Part 2) - Coach Ernie Pantusso is filled with joy when Irene accepts his marriage proposal. However, after winning a two million-dollar lotto, her life changes drastically and he isn't sure where he fits into it.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Diane Meets Mom - Dianes nervous about meeting Frasier's mother Hester, a renowned psychologist. Hesters pleasant during dinner, but when Frasier leaves them alone, she threatens to kill Diane.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep09
programme.desc: An American Family - Carla's ex-husband returns with his new bride, demanding custody of their oldest son. The normally fiesty Carla shocks everyone at the bar when she agrees to the request.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Diane's Allergy - After moving in with Frasier, Diane develops a chronic allergy and believes his beloved dog, Pavlov, causes it. When Sam adopts the canine, and Diane's sneezing fits continue

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Peterson Crusoe - Normally calm, Norm is shaken to his boots when a chest x-ray uncovers a mysterious spot. Suddenly, he realizes life has been passing him by and he decides to pursue his dream of sailing around the world.

programme.title: Married... With Children S3 Ep20

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep6
programme.desc: A culinary guessing game in which bakers must decode what type of dessert was made, when all that's left are a few clues. They have to recreate the recipe and the jury will determine how closely it matches the missing dessert.

programme.desc: A culinary guessing game in which bakers must decode what type of dessert was made, when all that's left are a few clues. They have to recreate the recipe and the jury will determine how closely it matches the missing dessert.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep98
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S10 Ep48
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep8
programme.desc: The Orpheus Syndrome - A special effects artist unearths a past project to find closure from the guilt of a fatal on-set accident; when old demons resurface, Charlie is left to unravel a new deadly plot.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep9
programme.desc: Escape From The Ski Mountain - Charlie finds herself stranded in a motel during a blizzard; in order to survive the night, Charlie must decipher the deadly tension between her questionable companions.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep10
programme.desc: The Hook - Charlie faces her greatest challenge yet when she is caught in the crossfire of a deadly power play that puts her in the sights of two ruthless crime syndicates and the FBI.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep1
programme.desc: The World Needs S'more People Like You - Ten home bakers must create a dessert that represents their personality.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep2
programme.desc: Choc Full Of Impressions - Nine remaining home bakers use everyday items to make lasting chocolate impressions on the judges. Immunity is on the line for the bakers who are hoping for a fruitful outcome in the chocolate elimination challenge.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep3
programme.desc: Chocolate Panning, Spice & Everything Nice - The eight home bakers take on the ancient chocolate making technique of panning. The Chocolate Elimination Challenge gets a little spicy when the bakers are asked to infuse some fun flavors into their confections.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep4
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror On The Glaze - Seven remaining competitors strive to mirror perfection when Chef Anna Olson teaches them how to use a mirror glaze technique. The home bakers create a decadent dessert inspired by a bestselling chocolate treat.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep5
programme.desc: I Have A Confection To Make - Only six home bakers remain and it's truly a spectacle, as they work in teams to take on the crown jewel of chocolate confections: the bonbon. It's bon voyage for one baker who fails to deliver an indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep6
programme.desc: Life Is What You Bake It - The remaining bakers create centerpieces out of ordinary cupcakes.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep7
programme.desc: Don't Be Afraid To Take Whisks - A 3D chocolate molding Technique Test gives the bakers one last chance to impress the judges and secure their spot in the final 3. One baker is given the opportunity of a lifetime.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep8
programme.desc: The Finale: Good Things Come To Those Who Bake - The top three home bakers take on their toughest challenge yet: creating an epic assortment of show-stopping confections to fill their dream Bake Shop window.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Do You Have What It Bakes? - Ten home bakers dive into the wonderful world of chocolate and must tackle the art of table tempering. Creativity runs wild as the home bakers create a chocolate dessert based on an animal that best represents them.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Where There's A Whisk, There's A Way - The nine home bakers use chocolate to create playful and delicious vessels to hold their desserts in their Technique Test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Time To Glaze The Bar - The eight home bakers make a solar system cake for their technique test.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Moved To Tiers - Sweet safety is on the line for the seven remaining home bakers. In the Technique Test, the bakers learn how to incorporate a rainbow of color into their desserts and create edible works of art.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Donut Give Up - The top six home bakers get their sweet on and create a dynamic chocolate sculpture for their Technique Test. Then the bakers get some sweet inspiration from home to spark the creation of a dozen delicious donuts.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bake It Till You Make It - The five remaining home bakers must create a beautiful collection of bonbons for their Technique Test. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers must create a dessert showcasing chocolate as a solid, liquid and a gas.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep7
programme.desc: A Legend In The Baking - The final four bakers must create theatrical desserts where chocolate takes center stage.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S2 Ep8
programme.desc: You Bake My Dreams Come True - In the season finale, the home bakers take on the most demanding bake of the entire competition - creating a sweet, delicious, show-stopping bakeshop display. One home baker will walk away with the $50, 000 grand prize.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Kodo - Joel and Nish enrol in the Kodo drumming school on a remote island in Japan. To pass, students must wake up at dawn every morning to exercise, do chores and drum all day.

programme.desc: Georgia and Azerbaijan - Joanna continues her adventure following the ancient Silk Road from the Black Sea to the Caspian Sea, across the rapidly changing post-Soviet states of Georgia and Azerbaijan.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep5
programme.desc: Pork Pies - Gregg Wallace's popular factory tour show will follow the production of pork pies at the Vale of Mowbray factory, Northallerton

programme.title: Universe S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sun: God Star - Professor Brian Cox journeys across the vastness of time and space.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Falling Behind - On the hunt for a steady supply of fish, Bentley and his father, Gary, brave subzero temperatures on a remote, frozen lake; Jon heads into the bush on a mission.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Behind the Lens - Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Loners - Sidle up to lone wolf alphas whod rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galpagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque - In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hippo Lagoon - Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambias Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, its full to the brim with water a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life theyve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Chatty/Communicative - Connect with Earths most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely dont take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters chilling screams; face angry fruit bats loud complaints; and explore orcas human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Apex Predators - Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of Prey - Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Scent Detectives - A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of Prey - Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Insect Eaters - Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold-Blooded Killers - From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Etosha: The Great White Place - Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Acacia Loop - As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula's Journey - Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. Its topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laoss tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asias two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March of the Crabs - On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Insect Eaters - Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snake Prison Island - Gorgona was once home to Colombias Alcatraz. Modelled on Nazi concentration camps, prisoners dreamt of escape. See the islands stunning wildlife through the eyes of a convict on the run, the monkeys, snakes and sloths whove now reclaimed the land.

programme.title: Colombia's Wild Coast 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March of the Crabs - On the island of Providencia, a black crab begins the mission of her life, escorting 80,000 eggs from her home, on a 3 km hike to the coast. Join her, and millions of her clan, on a journey fraught with danger, where chances of survival are slim.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep46
programme.desc: 8-Bit of Trouble / The Founding Feathers - When Archibald accidentally gets digitized by Loys laser scanner, he finds himself trapped inside a computer game. / Archibald discovers a long lost play that chronicles the founding of Crackridge. But when he over-promises a same day production, he must scramble to put on the historic show.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg / Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep20
programme.desc: The Cheer Hunter / Dot's Entertainment - Zoe invites Lotta to join her cheer squad and Audrey gets jealous. Dot becomes obsessed with making people laugh after telling her first joke.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep46
programme.desc: 8-Bit of Trouble / The Founding Feathers - When Archibald accidentally gets digitized by Loys laser scanner, he finds himself trapped inside a computer game. / Archibald discovers a long lost play that chronicles the founding of Crackridge. But when he over-promises a same day production, he must scramble to put on the historic show.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep30
programme.desc: Mystery! On the Yard Express / Lindsay Joins the Band - While passengers on board a fancy train, the Mighty Ones become a part of a classic whodunit. / With an impending visit from Brehts mother, Lindsay discovers she has more fun with her next door neighbors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep26
programme.desc: No - Puss in Boots returns to San Lorenzo at the behest of Dulcinea, to flush out an imposter masquerading as the town's protector.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.
